page.title: 05Rural Industry and Services
page.content: Although the area is mainly agricultural,there is a small Industrial Estate to the east of the village of Belford.In this Estate there are some 8 or 9 firms,including grain storage towers,a coal merchant business,a haulage garage,the Cattle Mart,Council Storage for road gritters,snow ploughs and road repair materials and an agricultural machinery servicing,repairs and sales firm.There are 2 Whinstone Quarries, where a large proportion of the village population work.These are to be found to the North_East of the village.The village of Belford, which lies on the old A1,has been recently by_passed to the east. There are a few businesses in Belford and the usual service industries for a community of this size.
